product_overview: pendingsystem is a Next.js-based logistics management platform for automotive service centers, providing real-time inventory tracking, customer booking management, and comprehensive order workflows to streamline automotive parts lifecycle from order placement to delivery.
core_goals: Centralize all pending parts tracking into one cohesive system
Automate routine operations and status updates to reduce manual effort
Provide real-time visibility across all stages of parts workflow
Enable seamless customer communication and appointment scheduling
Maintain comprehensive audit trails for compliance and reporting
key_features: Order Management API supporting CRUD operations integrated with Supabase backend
Real-time inventory tracking via Main Sheet with lifecycle status from Pending to Archive
Customer Communication module managing call lists and logging interactions
Booking System with premium calendar interface supporting multi-VIN grouping and status tracking
Archive and History management preserving audit trails with immutable records and reorder capabilities
Notification system with responsive alerts, badges, and detailed metadata
Advanced Search & Discovery across multiple tabs with VIN, Customer Name, Part Number, and Company filters
Settings & Configuration UX for part statuses, appearance, and history management
Backup Trigger API enabling report backups via GitHub Actions workflow
Report Settings API managing email recipients and backup scheduling
user_flow_summary: User imports or manually manages orders, creating tracking IDs and attaching notes/documents
Orders progress through lifecycle stages: Orders → Main Sheet → Call List → Booking → Archive
Users update statuses visually, lock records to avoid accidental edits, and perform bulk operations
Customer communication handled via call list with call status tracking and note attachments
Booking appointments scheduled via interactive calendar with pre-booking notes and status per VIN
System logs all historical data for 48 hours with reasons for archives and supports reordering from archives
Users receive notifications with detailed information and direct navigation to related items
Settings allow configuring statuses, auto-cleaning history, and appearance preferences
Administrators can trigger backups and configure report settings via APIs
validation_criteria: All core modules (Orders, Main Sheet, Booking, Call List, Archive) fully functional with workflow automations
API endpoints for orders, backups, and report settings respond as documented and handle errors
System UI responds within 100ms to user actions and supports datasets with thousands of rows
Data integrity maintained with no duplicate or inconsistent entries across modules
User training completes successfully within 2 hours with positive usability feedback
Notifications and search work accurately supporting navigation to source data
Audit trails and history logs confirm immutable records and proper retention
Backup workflows successfully trigger and complete with relevant status updates
